ModMetaData.name: Adeptus Mechanicus: Xenobiologis (Playable Orkoids)
ModMetaData.author: Ogliss
ModMetaData.description:
V1.6.1.2 Adds Warhammer 40k Orkz/Grotz as playable races Requires new start or a faction manager mod to have faction bases on the world map.
Contents Races: Orks - Humanlike Grots - Humanlike Snotlings - Advanced Animal Squigs - Animal: Cave Squig: similar to wargs, but can grow quite large given enough time Eatin Squigs: slow and stupid, only good fer eatin!
Factions: Orkz Feral Orkz Hulk Orkz Rok Orkz
Ork Player Faction Ork Player Tribe
Scenarios: Space Ork Start Feral Ork Start
Apparel: Greenskin Shirt (Ork/Grot only) Greenskin Jacket (Ork/Grot only) Slava Cowl (Ork/Grot only) Studded Arma (Ork/Grot only) Studded Elmet (Ork/Grot only) Flak Arma (Ork only) 'Ard Hat (Ork/Grot only) 'Eavy Arma (Ork only) 'Eavy 'Ard Hat (Ork/Grot only) Mega Arma (Ork only) Mega Elmet (Ork only)
Wargear: Stikkbomb Packs (Frag, Krak, Tankbusta) Kustom Force Field (Shield) Bosspole (Ork only) Iron Gob (Ork only)
Plants: Orkoid Fungus - the symbiotic fungus that is essential the orkoid ecosystem, it is a source of food, Squigs, Snotlings, Grots and Orks Orkoid Cocoons
Buildings: Ork Crafting Supplies Ork Fermenting Barrel - requires Syrchalis' Universal Fermenter mod
Resources: Orkoid Fungus - a food Bitz - basic orkish crafting material Komponent - Orkish components
Waart - made from orkoid fungus, used to make Grog - requires Syrchalis' Universal Fermenter mod Grog - a foul orkish alcholic beverage made from fungal Waart - requires Syrchalis' Universal Fermenter mod
Mechanics: Orkoid - All Orkz count as having both the Bloodlust and Psychopath trait. Symbiotic Fungus - All Orkoids originate from the same strain of fungal spores, which can mature into a might warboss, or a tiny mushroom.
Special Thanks to SirLalaPyon/LoliMaestro who contributed the following Orky textures Butcher Table Fueled Stove Doors Beds Tables Research Benches Drug Lab Turrets Fungus Grog Ork Skull Comradebusman2 who contributed the following Orky textures Waaagh! banner
